pages.text: $(li)The Ice is a translucent solid block that can be found in the $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/snow/frozen_ocean)Frozen Oceans$(/l), $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/snow/frozen_river)Frozen Rivers$(/l), $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/snow/ice_spikes)Ice Spikes$(/l), $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/snow/snowy_taiga)Snowy Taigas$(/l), $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/snow/snowy_mountains)Snowy Mountains$(/l), and $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/snow/snowy_tundra)Snowy Tundras$(/l).$(br)$(li)You will walk slower and slide on this block, but if you jump you will go faster on it.
$(li)The Ice block can be used to craft the $(l:patchouli:armors/ice_armor)Ice Armor$(/l).
